low level moisture after the sun set an inversion begin to set up not far above the ground and it will often reflect the radar beam closer to the ground so that it see the low level moisture better

we can see it in other area but because of the unique combination of distance from the radar angle along the radar beam and the height of the overpass through there that s where we see it the most and most pronounced
